fixtest.map:
fun({Doc}) ->
  D = couch_util:get_value(<<"data">>, Doc),
  T = couch_util:get_value(<<"ts">>, Doc),
  case T of
        undefined ->  ok;
        _ -> 
           case D of
                  undefined ->
                          Emit(1,1);
                  _ -> 
                          ok
           end
   end
end.
